data.lyric:
[ti:Somebody To Love]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:Somebody To Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Somebody To Love - Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)
[00:00.28]Produced by：Bram Inscore
[00:00.56]Can anybody find me somebody to love
[00:14.68]Each morning I get up I die a little
[00:20.51]Can barely stand on my feet
[00:26.41]Take a look in the mirror and cry
[00:32.25]Lord what you're doing to me
[00:37.48]I've spent all my years in believing you
[00:42.36]But I just can't get no relief Lord
[00:49.58]Somebody somebody
[00:53.18]Can anybody find me somebody to love
[01:16.04]I work hard every day of my life
[01:19.02]I work 'til I ache my bones
[01:22.54]At the end of the day
[01:26.49]I take home my pay all on my own
[01:30.08]I get down on my knees
[01:31.93]And I start to pray
[01:33.94]'Til the tears run down from my eyes
[01:37.30]Lord somebody ohh somebody
[01:41.77]Can anybody find me somebody to love
[01:51.66]Find me somebody to love
[01:55.58]Find me somebody to love
[01:59.28]Find me somebody to love
[02:03.17]Find me somebody to love
[02:06.85]Find me somebody to love
[02:10.88]Somebody
[02:12.66]Somebody to love
[02:14.30]Can anybody find me somebody to love
data.trans:
[ti:Somebody To Love]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:Somebody To Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.56]可以为我找一个人来爱么？
[00:14.68]每天起床 我离死亡又近了一步
[00:20.51]勉强地站起身来
[00:26.41]看一眼镜中的自己 我不禁泪流满面
[00:32.25]上帝啊 你对我做了什么啊
[00:37.48]我倾尽一生来虔诚信仰你
[00:42.36]但是我却仍是不得解脱
[00:49.58]是否有人 是否有人
[00:53.18]可以为我找一个人来爱么？
[01:16.04]我每天都辛勤工作
[01:19.02]拼到遍体鳞伤
[01:22.54]结果呢
[01:26.49]我只能拿着微薄的收入回家
[01:30.08]我默默地跪下双膝
[01:31.93]开始祈祷
[01:33.94]眼泪夺眶而出
[01:37.30]天啊 有没有人 有没有人
[01:41.77]可以为我找一个人来爱么？
[01:51.66]为我找一个人来爱
[01:55.58]为我找一个人来爱
[01:59.28]为我找一个人来爱
[02:03.17]为我找一个人来爱
[02:06.85]为我找一个人来爱
[02:10.88]谁能为我
[02:12.66]找一个人来爱
[02:14.30]可以为我找一个人来爱么？
